project.title: Complete Bathroom Renovation
project.description: We completely transformed an outdated and worn-down bathroom into a modern, functional, and aesthetically clean space. The project involved full demolition, installation of new water and drainage systems, waterproofing, tiling with high-quality ceramic tiles, and fitting new sanitary fixtures including a walk-in shower with glass paneling. We also integrated LED lighting and a suspended ceiling to create a bright and relaxing environment. The client requested a minimalist style with matte black accents for a contemporary look. The entire renovation was completed within 10 working days, with minimal disruption to the household. This project is a perfect example of how thoughtful design and professional execution can breathe new life into any home.
